turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let's get that set up. what do you want to order from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings do you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got to be pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you have a crust preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two of them to be thin crust and then one deep dish crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want two thin crust, and then one regular crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry could you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so you said 3 small pizzas, all pepperoni, 2 thin crust and 1 regular crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $34.55 is the total.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or could you make sure you put extra cheese in it, too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want extra cheese on all of the pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small pizzas, all pepperoni, 2 thin crust and 1 regular crust, all with extra cheese will cost $40.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place this order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy the pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
